full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 747 Filed 08/10/22 Page 127 of 228 803 LC2VMAX4 Alessi - Direct house. Q. And who did you see them interact with, if anyone? A. Mr. Epstein and Ms. Maxwell. Q. What, if any, trips did you personally take to any of Mr. Epstein's other properties? A. Yes. I took a trip to the ranch, Zorro Ranch in Santa Fe, New Mexico. There was supposed to be -- Q. I'm going to stop you there. About when did you go to New Mexico? A. I would say 1994, '95. Q. Who invited you to travel to Zorro Ranch? A. Ms. Maxwell and Mr. Epstein. Q. Did they tell you why they wanted you to come to the ranch? A. Yes, they did. Q. What did they say? A. They said it was going to be like a symposium. And this lady was going to teach all the personnel of the different homes how to clean the houses. Q. How did you travel from Florida to New Mexico for that symposium? A. I fly commercial from West Palm Beach to Albuquerque, New Mexico. And I was picked up by the house ranch manager at the ranch. Q. What did the ranch look like when you visited it? A. Oh, it was a huge, huge property. I don't remember how SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00018000
